edu.cnm.deepdive.picturequest.model.database

Class PictureQuestDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.room.RoomDatabase
      • edu.cnm.deepdive.picturequest.model.database.PictureQuestDatabase

  • public abstract class PictureQuestDatabase
extends RoomDatabase
    Class to create a RoomDatabase containing methods to get the Dao classes SceneDao, InputDao, ChoiceDao, ChoiceSynonymDao, and PlayerDao. Also contains methods to create the RoomDatabase itself if it has not yet been created. This class contains a nested class: PopulateDbTask an AsyncTask to populate the database with the Scenes, Choices, and ChoiceSynonym for the game.
    Author:
    Brian Alexander
